thread.title: The First Trailer For Michelle Rodriguez's Controversial Gender Reassignment Thriller Is Here - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: The First Trailer For Michelle Rodriguez's Controversial Gender Reassignment Thriller Is Here - BuzzFeed News

author: Sarah Karlan
title: The First Trailer For Michelle Rodriguez's Controversial Gender Reassignment Thriller Is Here - BuzzFeed News
text:
Rodriguez defended her role in the film shortly after, stating in an Instagram post : “The industry seems to be running low on edgy creativity & ‘real take a chance’ controversy, sometimes it makes me want to scream, instead I did what I always do when I’m bored with the ‘status quo’, I shot crazy b movie Indy to express my frustration.”
ID: 10391404 youtube.com
youtube.com
 ID: 10390791 5. And now, with a full trailer to cringe through, people have even more to say: View this image ›
Twitter: @UweBollocks ID: 10390357 6. Some pointed out various representational issues with the plotline View this image ›
Twitter: @UweBollocks ID: 10390380 7. Others were left literally speechless: View this image ›
@TheEmpir3 ID: 10390756 8. “Hold on to your hats kids,” wrote one Twitter user: View this image ›
Twitter: @uhh_kate ID: 10390743 9. “WOW it looks as bad as expected,” tweeted another: View this image ›
@melstonemusic ID: 10390766 10. There were some questions to ask, like: “ Why? “ View this image ›
@TheJWQ ID: 10391116 View this image ›
@Zippadalyssa ID: 10391031 12. “ WHAT ?” View this image ›
Twitter: @bunnyha79 ID: 10391259 13. And, in general, “ really !?” View this image ›
Twitter: @arthur_affect ID: 10391182 14. Still others felt the need to draw a line in the sand for their friends: View this image ›
Twitter: @notcarlbaxter ID: 10390392 15. To sum up how people are feeling about it: View this image ›
Twitter: @ferdosa_ ID: 10390893 16. The Assignment is set to be released later this year, though no specific date has yet been announced. ID: 10391439
Sarah Karlan is the Deputy LGBT Editor for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Sarah Karlan at sarah.karlan@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
